title: Tourist homes, Resorts, Hotels etc
clause_text: Tourist homes, Resorts, Hotels etc. with Rooms / suites, support are as for reception, kitchen, utility services etc. along with ancillary structures like covered parking, Watchman‘s quarter, guard cabin, landscape element sand only one observation tower per tourist resort up to the height of 15 m. with platform area up to 10 sq.m. in permanent / semi-permanent structural components.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
